content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0,0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (0,0))

### Coal extraction point at position (1,0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (1,0))

### Iron plate production facility at position (2,0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (2,0))
- Burner mining drill (position (2,1))

### Iron gear wheel factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position (3,0))
- Inserter (position (3,1)) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position (3,2)) that connects the furnace at position (2,0) to assembling machine at position (3,0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For instance, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing structures or entities that may block placement.
